DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate addictive property soda sugar sweeten beverage ( SBBs ) teenager age 13-18 year . It hypothesize participant regularly consume sweeten caffeinated beverage experience symptom typical caffeine withdrawal , headache fatigue , SSB withdrawal period .
